about_the_game:
Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for the European parliamentary elections of 2024 or many other alternative elections! In "Vox Populi: Europa 2024", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the continent to claim victory!



  • Choose from a host of different scenarios that place the continent in various realistic or fictional situations on different dates.
  • Recruit your campaign team from a variety of characters, based on their ideologies or traits.
  • Act directly on European countries or demographic groups to impact their political opinions and voting intentions.
  • Adapt your strategy to the actions of your opponents and place obstacles in their path.
  • Push Europe in the direction that suits your ideologies, between Sovereignism, Socialism and Europeanism. Support them, oppose them or combine them.
  • Face the many unforeseen events that will shake up the continent's political life.
  • Influence and organise European referendums to change voting rules, the number of member states or laws that directly benefit you.
  • Collect enough seats in the future European Parliament to ensure your influence on the continent's destiny.
  • Try to bring the whole continent together, create a single European state or dissolve the Union.
  • Collect dozens of cards that will help you in the great European debates.



This game includes:

  • 7 different scenarios, past or future, many with randomisation for replayability, adapted to the history and politics of Europe
  • A detailed, fully customisable character creator
  • Dozens of pre-existing or randomly generated characters
  • Dozens of unique ideologies and corpuses
  • A realistic subdivision of Europe into countries and demographic categories, each with its own characteristics
  • Flexible character actions that allow for a wide variety of gameplay
  • A unique system of triple political path combinations specific to Europe
  • 80 unique events
  • Dozens of character traits that influence their actions or debates
  • 50 varied cards for dynamic debates between characters
  • 50 possible referendums, fundamentally influencing gameplay or providing various advantages to candidates.
  • A unique system of parliament and political coalitions based on the ideologies of each candidate
  • Detailed collections of data and statistics to track the evolution of the electorate and your campaign
  • And much more to discover!
